name: contaflow-landing
description: Landing de ContaFlow lista para deploy en Vercel

scripts.build: node scripts/update-landing-entry-version.js && NODE_ENV=production babel static/landing.source.jsx --presets @babel/preset-env,@babel/preset-react --plugins @babel/plugin-transform-optional-chaining,@babel/plugin-transform-nullish-coalescing-operator,@babel/plugin-transform-class-properties,@babel/plugin-transform-object-rest-spread --minified --no-comments --out-file static/landing.bundle.js
